title: Pre-monsoon season road being built in Rohingya camp
text:
Pre-monsoon season road being built in Rohingya camp 8:27pm IST - 01:05 
The road will help prevent over 100,000 refugees from being affected by landslides and floods during Bangladesh's rainy season.   narration)   road will help prevent over 100,000 refugees from being affected by landslides and floods during Bangladesh's rainy season.   narration)  //reut.rs/2JsLn4q
